descriptionHtml:
SKYRIM RETRO
CHEATS
A BAT FILE PACK FOR SKYRIM
BY NIV LEV ARI

Edit: my mistake! there's been a slight misinformation about three of the cheats:

"from my personal armory" is the weapons cheat
"unfair combat" is unqiue items
and
"if it's simple and strong" is regular armor

changelog:
a)some of you requested i give a bit of information about the retro cheats:
1) you can't use these cheats with perk modifing mods
2)here are some examples of cheats quoted thanks to one of you fine members of this community([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4526967]gkjzhgffjh[/url])
bat shoutoutloud: No cooldown on shouts.

bat nothingtofear: Maxes all skills,gives you all vanila perks, etc. (Skeleton key, 1k Dragonsouls, lots of money)

bat makeeveryarrowcount: Gives you lots of arrows.

One should note than many of the "cheats" are incompatible with perk mods.

b) I Unified All 4 packs Retro Cheats Main,2,3,4  together(and added new cheats for workbench spawns and crafting gear. be sure to download that
Description):

as someone who grew up during the days of the retro
RTS(starcraft-brood war,age of empires 2,age of
mythology) and the retro shooter and open world
titles(GTA VICE CITY,grand theft auto 2,hitman 2) I
remember loving to cheat video games and as I grew
older and made a pretty major shift into the elder
scrolls(and also discovered the power of bat files)
franchise: I always wanted to bring those retro cheats I
remember so fondly: the weird phrases that somehow
made sense with the game's story,typed in and played
ingame,into the my experiences with skyrim(and
eariler,with oblivion...i also bring them to that game
aswell)
so,in order to make that dream a reality and with a lot of
know how about the bethesda engines' bat file system,i
recreated what I would believe,would have been the
retro cheats of skyrim if it came out in the early 2000's
installation
installation-wise,”skyrim retro cheats” is easy as pie: all
you gotta do is download the archive,extract the folder to
someplace on your computer you like,open it up and
either cut or copy and paste the .txt files there into your
skyrim root folder(your main folder in skyrim where your
launcher and executable is,NOT the data folder)
cheat codes
all cheat codes for this mod start with opening the
console (~) and typing “bat” without quotes and the
command you want:
example: bat nothingtofear

the full list of cheats,commands and result will be in the PDF file you download with the archive

Special thanks
bethesda softworks-for skyrim(And oblivion and
morrowind and daggerfall,basicly,all the original
elder scrolls titles)
childhood game cheats-for childhood cheat fun
the nexus community-for letting me post this to all
skyrim mod users
and lastly,you,the user- for you patronage
see ya :)
author: nivlevari123456789
